name: Star Shot (elipter)
description: Protect your little blue friend Blungus by shooting down the red Grungles using your stars. The blue guy can collect stars to refill your ammo, and star crates will fall from the sky when you run out of ammo. Player 1 controls Blungus and has to avoid getting hit by the Grungles and collect stars for player 2, meanwhile player 2 has to protect Blungus by shooting the Grungles while avoiding shooting Blungus. Trust your teammate and keep Blungus alive for as long as possible!
